present.english: The careful nurse checks the important document
The experienced supervisors check the full schedule

The careful nurse was checking the important document
The experienced supervisors were checking the full schedule

The careful nurse will check the important document
The experienced supervisors will check the full schedule

aorist.english: The careful nurse checked the important document
The experienced supervisors checked the full schedule

optative.english: I should check the sick patient
